parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.58

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set custom data for the task. Tooltip will be drawn in task list on the right side. Description will be drawn in task description panel on the bottom.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> task '''setSimpleTaskCustomData''' [IconPath, tooltip, description]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> task: [[Task]] - task the custom data are being added to

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> iconPath: [[String]] - icon path

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> tooltip: [[String]] - text displayed next to the icon; max. 3 charactersc

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> description: [[String]] - text displayed on the task description panel; html format

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> _task [[setSimpleTaskCustomData]] ["\A3\Ui_f\data\IGUI\Cfg\simpleTasks\letters\h_ca.paa", "This is the tooltip", "This is the description"];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[taskCustomData]], [[setSimpleTaskType]], [[taskType]], [[Arma 3: Task Framework#Task Overhaul|Tasks Overhaul]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- BEGIN Note Section -->
</comment><comment><!-- For example:
<dd class="notedate">Posted on Month Day, Year - Time (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:User Name|]]</dt>
<dd class="note">This is an example note. It is true and verifiable, and contains a little code snippet.
<code>[[if]] ([[Magic Variables#this|_this]] == anExample) [[then]] { [[hint]] "Leave it here for others to read"; };</code></dd>
-->
</comment><comment><!-- END Note Section -->
</comment></dl>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
